twitch_info.title: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 - Extra Stage - Screen 6 - EX Justice - Clear!!!!
twitch_info.description:
Actually insane. Took me 2 weeks of grinding and over 24 hours total in the game, but I have finally beaten this.
Two weeks of grinding, 2 hours a day except Fridays & Saturdays where I spent far longer (4+ hours typically) and some Sundays, with sometimes 3-4 hours on some other weekdays probably.
Finally beaten! :D
This was by far the hardest Extra Stage Area I have done so far, and is definitely harder than Tempest Crystal which only took me 29 hours.
Total Time: 1 days 6 hours 59 minutes 31 seconds.
(30 hours 59 minutes 31 seconds)
Total Deaths: 11047
Attempts Time: 1 days 2 hours 22 minutes 7 seconds
(26 hours 22 minutes 7 seconds)
Attempts Deaths: 8205
Practice Time: 4 hours 37 minutes 24 seconds.
Practice Deaths: 2842
